arts.ttl: Arne Slot shows his true colours as Accrington Stanley boss reveals chat
arts.sum: Liverpool defeated Accrington Stanley 4-0 at Anfield in the FA Cup but the Lancashire side were able to take away positives from the clash with boss John Doolan paying tribute to Arne Slot

arts.ttl: Chelsea fans send clear Rio Ngumoha message after Liverpool gem’s debut against Accrington Stanley
arts.sum: Liverpool cruised into the fourth round of the FA Cup after beating Accrington Stanley 4-0 in Saturday’s third-round clash at Anfield. Liverpool opened the scoring...

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Accrington Stanley: Rio Ngumoha's performance assessed as 16-year-old breaks Reds FA Cup record
arts.sum: Sports Mole analyses the performance of record-breaking teenager Rio Ngumoha in Liverpool's 4-0 win over Accrington Stanley in the FA Cup third round.

arts.ttl: Liverpool fans are making the same blunt point about Jayden Danns after beating Accrington Stanley
arts.sum: Liverpool cruised into the next round of the FA Cup with an easy victory over Accrington Stanley and the day was capped off further by...

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Accrington Stanley: Reds march on in FA Cup as Rio Ngumoha impresses on debut
arts.sum: Premier League leaders rarely looked troubled at Anfield

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold takes centre stage as Liverpool brush aside Accrington
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold ran the show and scored the Reds’ second goal.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Accrington Stanley: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Trent Alexander-Arnold scores screamer
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold scores a wonder goal as Liverpool secure safe passage into the fourth round of the FA Cup with a 4-0 win over Accrington Stanley.

arts.ttl: Trent stunner helps Liverpool cruise past Accrington Stanley
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold showcased his value for Liverpool by scoring a stunning goal as the Reds cruised into the FA Cup fourth round via a routine 4-0 win over League Two side Accrington Stanley.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 4-0 Accrington Stanley: Trent Alexander-Arnold scores STUNNER and Federico Chiesa opens Reds' account as Arne Slot's side cruise into FA Cup fourth round
arts.sum: JOE BERNSTEIN AT ANFIELD: Alexander-Arnold celebrated wearing the captain's armband with a stunning strike as Liverpool saw off the resistance of underdogs Accrington Stanley.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold scores stunning goal against Accrington Stanley - as Liverpool star answers his critics after nightmare Man United display amid contract saga
arts.sum: With Virgil van Dijk rested as part of a rotated Reds side that included a debut for 16-year-old Rio Ngumoha, Alexander-Arnold was handed the armband for the clash.
